main.name: John Sproat
main.description: I am an aspiring technical professional who is seeking an opportunity start in a new field inside the technical world. I enjoy hands on work and customer service. I am goal oriented and strive to always be great at my work.

education.school: University of North Carolina at Charlotte
education.degree: Certificate in Full-Stack JavaScript Web Development
education.description: I completed an intensive program focusing on the different aspects of a full-stack web development cycle, focusing on the MERN and the MEAN stacks.

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: I have been working with HTML5, CSS3, and Javascript in variously scaled projects, while building my skills in Web Development.

work.title: Cultivator
work.description: I performed a wide range of duties at this position. These duties required a lot of laboratory style operations and strict adherence to changing medical laws. Inventory management and shipment compiling were common activites while maintaining a sterile work environment and otherwise working with plants.

work.title: Security Specialist
work.description: This position was laregely based around customer service for employees and guests of the establishment. I mianly operated a control room for the one million square foot turbine generator plant and adjoined office facilities. My other duties included maintaining a database of the company's contacts and daily shipment activity.
